verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> ye of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>, even of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H2385>lightnings<s%>; and he will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H4306>rain<s%>, to every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

For the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H205>vanity<s%>, and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%>; and they have <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, they <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in <S%H1892>vain<s%>: therefore they <S%H5265>go<s%> their way like <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, they are <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>, because there is no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

Mine <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6260>he-goats<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and will <S%H7760>make<s%> them as his <S%H1935>goodly<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

From him shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6438>corner-stone<s%>, from him the <S%H3489>nail<s%>, from him the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>, from him every <S%H5065>ruler<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And they shall be as <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H947>men<s%>, treading down their enemies in the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>; and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%>, because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is with <S%H7392>them<s%>; and the riders on <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall be <S%H3001>confounded<s%>.

And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and I will bring them <S%H3427>back<s%>; for I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon <S%H834>them<s%>; and they shall be as though I had not cast them <S%H2186>off<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and I will hear <S%H6030>them<s%>.

And they of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H3820>man<s%>, and their heart shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine<s%>; <S%H1121>yea<s%>, their children shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1523>it<s%>, and rejoice; their <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
I will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> for <S%H6908>them<s%>, and gather <S%H6299>them<s%>; for I have redeemed <S%H7235>them<s%>; and they shall increase as they have <S%H7235>increased<s%>.

And I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> them among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; and they shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me in far <S%H4801>countries<s%>; and they shall <S%H2421>live<s%> with their <S%H1121>children<s%>, and shall <S%H7725>return<s%>.

I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> also out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them out of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>; and place shall not be found for <S%H4672>them<s%>.

And he will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction<s%>, and will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and all the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up<s%>; and the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> shall be brought <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%>.
And I will <S%H1396>strengthen<s%> them in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they shall walk up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
